text.config.turtleshelldrop.title: Turtle Shell Drop Config
text.config.turtleshelldrop.option.shell: Chance that a turtle shell will drop when a turtle is killed.
text.config.turtleshelldrop.option.dropW: Drop shells when the turtle is killed directly by the player.
text.config.turtleshelldrop.option.babyT: Allow drops from dead baby turtles.
